main.name: Aaron Feingold
main.bio:
I'm Aaron Feingold. A full-stack developer, sommelier, and entrepreneur based in New Orleans. My tech stack includes TypeScript, Next.js, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and AWS.

My experience bridges the domains of fine wine and technology. I've also been a founder, and sales rep.

 I'm building a comprehensive knowledge base that provides instant confidence in wine selection.

 At Vino Vibes, we provide the path for sommelier-level wine selections intuitively. The platform helps diners move from uncertainty to educated choices, transforming overwhelming wine lists into opportunities for memorable experiences.

My approach centers on three core principles: Knowledge. Confidence. Experience.

Knowledge: Creating educational tools that distill complex wine expertise into accessible insights. Confidence: Eliminating the guesswork and analysis paralysis that prevents people from exploring new wines. Experience: Building technology that enhances real-world dining moments rather than replacing them.

My technical foundation includes modern containerized deployments with Docker, infrastructure as code, and automated CI/CD pipelines. I prioritize observable, scalable systems that can grow with ambitious projects—whether that's handling thousands of wine pairing requests or supporting distributed development teams working on secure EC2 environments.

Beyond Vino Vibes AI, I'm actively seeking full-stack development opportunities within innovative startups that value authentic problem-solving and technical excellence. I bring proven experience in building production-ready applications, leading technical initiatives, and a unique perspective shaped by years in both hospitality and technology sectors.

Currently, I'm expanding my technical toolkit to include workflow automation and advanced knowledge management systems, always with an eye toward creating solutions that empower rather than overwhelm users.

If you're interested in collaborating on meaningful technology projects, discussing startup opportunities, or simply connecting over our shared appreciation for well-crafted solutions, let's talk.

projects.title: vinovibes.ai
projects.description: Meet SIP the Owl, your sommelier in pocket. SIP by vino vibes is a platform that allows you to find the perfect wine for your vibe
projects.businessIdea: VinoVibes democratizes fine wine by getting millennials and Gen Z excited about ordering wine at restaurants. Our AI sommelier, SIP the Owl, creates hyper-personalized wine recommendations based on your unique vibes—think favorite athlete (Adam Ondra), music taste (heavy metal), and even your zodiac sign (Pisces)—to select the perfect wine from any restaurant's list. The app eliminates analysis paralysis by providing instant, confident selections while tracking your wine journey and enabling social sharing with fellow vino vibers. Restaurant staff can also use SIP to overcome knowledge gaps, making expert-level recommendations without hiring a sommelier. By combining custom food-wine pairings, personal taste tracking, and vibe-based AI matching, we're making fine wine accessible to everyone while tangentially boosting restaurant wine sales. It's about giving people confidence in their selections and making the wine experience social, personal, and fun.

projects.title: festvibes.ai
projects.description: Transform any day into a personalized music festival. A decentralized music discovery platform that helps users discover live local music, plan with friends, and create the ultimate festival experience. Features AI-powered event recommendations, social collaboration tools, venue insights, and community-driven music discovery for New Orleans music lovers.
projects.businessIdea: FestVibes.ai is a platform that democratizes music festival experiences by allowing users to create personalized, decentralized festivals using local venues and events. Combines AI-powered discovery with social planning tools to help music communities connect and discover live music experiences in their area.

projects.title: the-tchoupitoulas-data-challenge
projects.description: A comprehensive data analysis platform for the Creole Creamery Hall of Fame challenge. Built a full-stack application that scrapes, processes, and visualizes competition data using LLM-powered web scraping, machine learning predictions, and interactive dashboards. Features include automated data collection via AWS Lambda, predictive modeling for competition timing, and beautiful data visualizations with real-time analytics.
projects.businessIdea: The Tchoupitoulas Data Challenge is a sophisticated data analytics platform that demonstrates end-to-end data science capabilities. It combines automated data collection, machine learning predictions, and interactive visualizations to analyze competition patterns. The project showcases real-world data engineering skills including LLM-powered web scraping, predictive modeling with limited data, and building production-ready data dashboards. Perfect for demonstrating full-stack data science capabilities and infrastructure automation.

projects.title: Ariba Property Tax Assessment Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive property tax assessment analysis platform designed to streamline tax appeal processes for attorneys. Features advanced data visualization, AI-powered property analysis, interactive mapping, and automated report generation. The platform helps tax attorneys identify potential appeal cases by analyzing property valuations, comparing similar properties, and generating detailed assessment reports with comparable property analysis.
projects.businessIdea: Ariba is a specialized platform that revolutionizes property tax assessment analysis for tax attorneys. By combining comprehensive property data with advanced analytics, interactive visualizations, and AI-powered analysis tools, it helps attorneys identify potential tax appeal opportunities more efficiently. The platform processes large datasets of property records, provides detailed comparable property analysis, generates automated reports, and offers interactive dashboards for data exploration and client presentation.
